amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit the Secretary of Defense from paying for or reimbursing expenses relating to abortion services.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Secretary of Defense from paying for or reimbursing expenses relating to abortion services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 213 (Roll no. 300).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Jackson (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 213 (Roll no. 300).
